official_title: To allow the Corps of Engineers to accept a voluntary payment of a toll or operating charge.

summary.text: Amends the Rivers and Harbors Appropriations Act of 1884 to allow the Corps of Engineers to accept a voluntary payment of a toll or operating charge.
